mapper.select: select w.rule_id, w.rule_name, w.rule_ip, w.description from whitelist w
select w.rule_id, w.rule_name, w.rule_ip, w.description from whitelist w where w.rule_id = #{ruleId}
select w.rule_id, w.rule_name, w.rule_ip, w.description from whitelist w where w.rule_name = #{ruleName}
mapper.insert: insert INTO whitelist (rule_id,rule_name, rule_ip, description) values (#{ruleId},#{ruleName},#{ruleIp},#{description});
